text: Lisa Jane Riley (born 13 July 1976) is an English television presenter and actress. She is best known for portraying the role of Mandy Dingle in the ITV soap opera Emmerdale (1995–2001, 2019–present). Riley succeeded Jeremy Beadle as presenter of You've Been Framed!. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:English television actors Category:English television presenters Category:Soap opera actors Category:Actors from Greater Manchester
title: Lisa Riley
